ygData.subject: The un-named group...
ygData.msgSnippet: Deemos laughs. Don t worry Infectra, with you with us, we have 9, that combined with the other Maximals and the Preds and Alliance will fall! Deemos said.

Deemos laughs.

"Don't worry Infectra, with you with us, we have 9, that co=
mbined with the other Maximals and the Preds and Alliance will fall!" Deemo=
s said.

"We have no Maximal leader, Deemos." Blender said.

"Maybe I shoul=
d run for leader if there isn't a leader." Deemos said. (He doesn't know ab=
outIron Raptor) He thought about the mission.

"Let's go!" Deemos said. He =
walks toward the Predacon base. His group of 7, still un-named, follow him.=
..
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 2:04 AM
  Subject: Re: Airbom=
ber...


  Infectra



  *Infectra looks at Airbomber*


  Infectra: "I'm a=
fraid I'm going to get slagged just like that. and no one get mad. I'm not =
doubting any of you. But, there is a chance we could end up out numbered to=
ugh. You probably think I'm being silly and dumb."


  *Infectra says to Ai=
rbomber*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 1:05 AM
    Subject: A=
irbomber...


    Airbomber seen the fear in Infectra's eyes.

    "Why are=
 you afraid?" Airbomber asked her...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
    From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednes=
day, August 23, 2000 12:25 AM
      Subject: Re: Doom Ice...


      Infect=
ra


      *Infectra frowns. She really didn't know anything about this or =
what to do but her heart took gained force over her brain where she only th=
ought about her love for Airbomber and didn't want to lose him. She slowly =
walks over feeling a bit scared but raises her hands in air with the others=
 but still felt scared*

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From=
: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, August =
23, 2000 12:05 AM
        Subject: Doom Ice...


        A satsis pod falls=
 in front of the Maximals base. At the same time, Deemos and his group are =
repaired and come from the CR Chamber, their wounds were fatal but not majo=
r. The 6 of them sport a different paint job, all 6 of them are purple, bla=
ck, and white now. Deemos and his group go outside and see the pod. Deemos =
gives the thumbs up to His comrades. They start to program it.

        "Na=
me?" Deemos asked.

        "It says the name is...Tint." Rizopas says. Dee=
mos's smile is huge.

        "Make the name Doom Ice, you can do that, if =
she was dumb enough to escape in a stasis pod, we reprogram her!" Deemos sa=
id.

        "Isn't that what we are against?" Artist asked.

        "No, =
Artist, it's not, we are just trying to make more bots good!" Deemos replie=
d. Airbomber walks up and sees the pod.

        "What are you guys doing w=
ith the pod?" He asked. Suddenly, every one of Deemos' group members had a =
blaster stuck in Airbomber's face.

        "I say we kill him!" Blender sa=
id.

        "I say we make him join us in our fight!" Diskus said.

      =
  "For once your intelligent, Diskus!" Stronghold said. Airbomber is sweati=
ng now, he didn't know what that meant but it scared him. Deemos came up fr=
om behind him. (Don't know if Infectra is there, but I assume she is, if sh=
e's not then tell me) Stronghold and Blender target Infectra. Deemos starts=
 to pump some phony info into his mind with the device, and bam! He already=
 looks serious.

        "Infectra, you might as well leave." Deemos said.
=

        "I will join you, you guys are right, we do need less violence, th=
e war must end, and if there must be a war to end the war, so be it!" Airbo=
mber said. He turns back to Infectra.

        "Do not worry, Infectra, I s=
till love you, you don't have to leave." Airbomber said. Deemos laughed and=
 rubbed his hands together as Rizopas reprograms Tint and makes her Doom Ic=
e. Doom Ice is first seen now, she stands and looks around. Deemos is in a =
new form, but she reconizes him. But, she has no fear, he seems different. =
She knew of their war, she didn't know how, but she knew. (Reprogrammed and=
 memory addage while she was asleep)

        "I shall join you." Doom Ice =
said. Deemos looked at his growing group, A few more and he'll rule the Neo=
 Beast Wars! It's a sure thing! He thought. He had 8 now, and it felt prett=
y good. Doom Ice didn't remember Land Mine a single bit, and remembered Dee=
mos as your lord and almighty leader.

        "For the Maximals, and every=
one's protection and peace! Until all...are one!" Deemos shouted. Doom Ice =
and Airbomber's hands were raised and the 8 of them raised their hands high=
 in the air. Airbomber waved for Infectra to do it to, not caring about wha=
t she thought of this group...
